security: Disclosing the specific offices and divisions within the CIA that receive certain types of information could expose the organizational structure of the agency and potentially compromise its operational capabilities. This list reveals the internal structure of the agency and the locations of key personnel.
summary: This document is a distribution list outlining the field and headquarters divisions and stations that receive a particular BD (Bureau Distribution) #5847 within the CIA.
summary_one_paragraph: This document, marked as SECRET and designated BD #5847, lists the various field and headquarters divisions and stations within the CIA that receive this particular distribution. The list includes locations in the AF (Africa), FE (Far East), EUR (Europe), WH (Western Hemisphere), and NB (Near East) Divisions, along with specific offices within the CA (Covert Action) Staff, NE (Near East) Division, WH Division, EUR Division, and other headquarters departments. The distribution spans numerous global locations, indicating the breadth of the CIA's operational reach and informational dissemination network.
title: Field and HQS Distribution - BD #5847
